## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G42770](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G42770)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>PRU1</u>
- **Gene Name:** PHOSPHATE RESPONSE UBIQUITIN E3 LIGASE 1
- **Description:**   F-box/RNI-like/FBD-like domains-containing protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2085013
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_069673C]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Increased sensitivity to low-Pi stress. Mutants accumulate more anthocyanin under low PI stress.
